data: The night that hung over the sea was windless and blissfully silver-pure after the glowing splendour of the day; and the great quadrireme glided evenly and softly, as though upon a lake, under a wide firmament of stars.
The Tour: A Story of Ancient Egypt
Couperus, Louis, 1863-1923; Teixeira de Mattos, Alexander, 1865-1921 [Translator]
